title: Lord Donnell's Daughter
description: Novella for children aged 10-15 with versions in English and Italian.Mary Donnell has grown up in Italy with her Italian mother and English father. In 1982, aged twelve, she sits sleepily in a class taught by nuns, bored by the lessons, and dreaming of a life outdoors in the country where she could keep a dog.One day she wakes up to find everything has changed. She is no longer in Italy but in Ireland. The year is no longer 1982 but 1845. Her father is no longer James Donnell, a teacher, but Lord Michael Donnell of Donnell House, Waterford. She is confined to her bed, having been concussed in a riding accident. And she has a dog!Again and again Mary insists that she is an Italian girl from the 20th century. Her protests are dismissed as confusion due to her fall. She realises she has no choice but to accept this new life...
author: Lillian Camfield
